abstract.para: Quality Assurance project will provide, monitor and manage the quality and standards adherence of Uludag releases and processes. Although this project incorporates non-value-adding processes, is of central importance for both production and product itself.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Quality Assurance Project:
For all the projects the processes will be identified and documented, relevant criteria will be defined, consistency will be checked, The success metrics will be identified, measurement processes will be formed and executed, External standards will be followed, internal standards will be defined and documented, The information architecture and content management for Uludag external, internal and developer web sites will be carried out, All the documentation from other projects will be monitored in terms of quality adherence and standards compliance, these documents will be prepared in-house and by contributors, the process will be coordinated, The quality criteria and guidelines for all external contributions will be determined, relevant manuals will be prepared.
Project contact: Zerrin Çakmakkaya, zerrin@uludag.org.tr
